events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as it doesn't fit me properly and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's request was identified as a refund case due to their interest in returning the product for money back.
The refund request has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling and customer assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for return so I can process your refund accordingly?

We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Hi again! Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and that you're satisfied with the resolution of your return.

The refund case has been closed successfully. Thank you for contacting us, and please reach out if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. We would appreciate your feedback on our refund process.
